page.title: 20Southend:A day in life of
page.content:
This was an{account}written by a third year girl called{Marye Matthew.
"I am the first to wake up in my family.Then at about 7.10,my dad gets up and washes.Then my brother gets up and creeps into my mum & dad's room.At 7.45 my dad leaves for work.He works in an office.Then Timmy and I get dressed.At 8.00 we have breakfast, after which I get my things ready for school.Then I go to school at 8.30.While I am at school,my mother does the housework.After school,I watch the T.V. At 5.45,I get ready for guides which is at 6.45.When I come home at 8.30,I go to bed."
{This section of the project was {compiled by the children of the Thorpe {Junior Schools and Fairfax High {School.
